trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Concordia
There were no other sightings in Concordia on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching fireworks on the West side of town sitting in our car. Saw a yellowish light in the sky, thought it was fireworks at first, but it kept moving slowly across the sky and passed just on the south of us. It was fairly low in the sky. Got out of the car for a better view and it kept moving with out the light diminishing.Two others soon followed heading west. We watched until they disappeared. There was no sound noted from the objects and no positioning lights. We decided to head West out of town to see if we could sight them again. About one mile out of town on a dark road noticed what appeared to be a bright star low in the sky. We pulled over and observed it to see if would move. It stood still then it shifted to one side and then back again before heading to the South. Then it just disappeared from sight.
Summary: Watching fireworks saw yellowish light in sky heading west followed by two others on same course.
